أول تعليق من حركة حماس على القصف الإسرائيلي بقطاع غزة

02 Nov 2019

رام الله - دنيا الوطنقال المتحدث باسم حركة المقاومة الإسلامية (حماس)، فوزي برهوم: إن قصف واستهداف الاحتلال مواقع المقاومة، وأهلنا في غزة، استمرار لمسلسل العدوان والإجرام "الصهيوني" بحق شعبنا ومقاومته الباسلة، وتصعيد خطير بحق المدنيين الأبرياء، يتحمل "العدو الصهيوني" تبعاته وتداعياته.وأضاف في بيان نشرته وكالة (الرأي) المحلية الحكومية بغزة، أن حجم الاعتداءات التي طالت العديد من مواقع المقاومة، يعكس نواياه المسبقة بالتدمير والتخريب، وقتل الأبرياء مؤكداً أن تفجير الأوضاع مع المقاومة لن يرتد إلا في وجه الاحتلال.وتابع برهوم: ننعى الشهيد أحمد الشحري، الذي ارتقى جراء هذا القصف الهمجي، ونتمنى الشفاء العاجل للجرحى والمصابين.وأكد المتحدث باسم حماس، أن "دماء أبناء شعبنا غالية لن يسمح أحد للعدو باستباحتها والتجرؤ عليها، أو أن تكون غزة ساحة لتصدير أزماته الداخلية، وهذه الجرائم لن تكسر صمود شعبنا، ولن تثنينا عن المضي قدماً في طريق الجهاد والمقاومة، دفاعاً عن شعبنا ومواجهة العدوان".

text:
Macario ... amazement, joy, theater, feelings of a community
Before more than 300 people, the staging in the Tronconal congregation opens
02 Nov 2019 by Drafting | Xalapa's Diary
Xalapa, Ver.- It has been five months since the work began. The actors come and go, the band sharpens its winds and percussions. First call They test torches, review details and chords. There are laughs, nerves, cravings, it smells like copal, cempasúchil and Día de Muertos.
Second call The town gradually takes its seats, special guests arrive, vendors, even the dogs of the congregation go down to the event. Third call: The flute and drum sounds, the dancers of Chiltoyac enter and the staging Macario, in Tronconal, begins.
The night has fallen on the forest, and in Los Pozos, the place where the work takes place, the catrinas rise ... the dresses flutter, the band plays La Llorona. The 150 chairs are occupied, and more than 200 people contemplate standing, among the smoke of incense, an unprecedented event in the town: the birth of the Tronconal Community Peasant Theater Group.
It took 17 years for this town to organize again, return to its tastes, and assemble, in a big way, a work in which almost 80 people participate on the scene; five years the youngest, and 80, the most enthusiastic.
A lot happened for Isidoro Mejía, set designer, Arturo Huerta, Macario, and Guillermo Solano, the Devil, to do theater again, but not those pastorelas that they liked so much almost two decades ago, but a work that, no doubt, will remain in the memory.


Photo: Courtesy

Some had never participated in a play, most had not seen any, but on Friday night, they all wore, they were all professional, passionate actors who did not forget their lines, who were betrayed by nerves.
In the front row the municipal president Hipólito Rodríguez Herrero sat down; the president of the Municipal System for the Integral Development of the Family (DIF), Rosío Córdova Plaza; the directors Guillermina Ramírez Rodríguez and María Consuelo Niembro Domínguez; the municipal agent Pascasio García Hernández; the director of the Interior, Juan Vergel Pacheco, and the coordinator of Citizen Attention, Germán Vidal Peralta.
The mist appeared and helped the atmosphere of the play. There was everything. Laughter, amazement and even shouts of those who sought to integrate in some way, because this staging belongs to Tronconal: The majority of the public are mothers, fathers, brothers, uncles, aunts, nephews, friends and acquaintances of those who rehearsed hard, each Monday, Wednesday and Friday, Saturdays, Sundays, for this day.














At 7:13 p.m. that rain began that falls softly on things, and then it got worse, but nobody left, they got together. The umbrellas opened, and the work continued. The rain stopped, the fog was part of the scenery.
After almost two hours, suddenly, silence. The work concludes. A shower of applause floods the forest for almost ten minutes, “Bravo! Amazing! Long live Tronconal! They are the best! Long live Chiltoyac! ” Even the Municipal President makes his enthusiasm visible: “A true spectacle that we have just witnessed, the community must feel very proud. They are professionals, their work is admirable, congratulations and follow the functions ”.
And yes, the presentations will continue every Friday and Saturday of November, at 6:00 p.m., in the place known as Los Pozos, in the Tronconal congregation.
